data.name: Splinters of Regret
data.detailed_description:
Splinters of Regret is a student-made action game with a focus on bullet hell elements and an atmospheric aesthetic.

After committing multiple sins in life, you are forced to face them in death. A mountainous prison made of your own regrets seeks to make sure you never forget them. Make your way through the regretful hordes and hazardous terrain to find a form of peace at the top.

Splintering
With the power of Splintering, you have a second chance at "life" after the regrets overwhelm you. However, you are defenseless and must survive the onslaught to regain your control. Vulnerability is what your regrets want.

Items and Artifacts
Encounter a variety of items and artifacts to help you on your journey. Items provide one-use destruction against the regretful hordes that plague you. Artifacts are lasting equipment that gives you a source of protection and aid.

The Language of Na'en
Listen to the original language of Na'en that the inhabitants speak from across the void in their own personal regret-filled prisons. You can find our language document at this link: https://imgur.com/a/9OdVZ9d.
